content.value: 🏦👉📊 = 😍 I can finally release youneedaspreadsheet.com ! You can connect all of your bank accounts & credit cards to Google Sheets using Open Banking APIs. My budgeting spreadsheets are so much more powerful now🤓. #openbanking #fintech
content.html: 🏦👉📊 = 😍 I can finally release youneedaspreadsheet.com ! You can connect all of your bank accounts & credit cards to Google Sheets using Open Banking APIs. My budgeting spreadsheets are so much more powerful now🤓. #openbanking #fintech
